abstract: Comprehensive performance optimization and accessibility guide for Ember.js applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 30+ rules across 7 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (route loading optimization, build performance) to incremental (advanced patterns). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and specific impact metrics to guide automated refactoring and code generation. Includes accessibility best practices leveraging ember-a11y-testing and other OSS tools.
